search.query: $source_token$ | fields ip_src_combined, ip_dst_combined, src_query_name, frame_len, src_is_private_ip, eth_src, tls_handshake_type, traffic_analyzer_stream, tcp_stream, _* | table ip_src_combined, ip_dst_combined, src_query_name, frame_len, src_is_private_ip, eth_src, tls_handshake_type, traffic_analyzer_stream, tcp_stream
sourcetype=capture | dedup source | rex field=source "\S*\/(?<shortSource>[^\)].*)" | table shortSource | sort shortSource

| dedup ip_src_combined | where if("$filteredMAC$"="*", like(eth_src, "%"), like(eth_src, "%$filteredMAC$%") OR like(eth_dst, "%$filteredMAC$%")) | eval src_is_private_extended=if( cidrmatch("$custom_ip_range$", ip_src_combined) OR src_is_private_ip == "1", "True", "False") | where src_is_private_extended == "True" | where ip_src_combined!="" AND ip_src_combined!="0.0.0.0" | eval eth_short=substr(eth_src,1,8) | join type=left eth_short [ search sourcetype="list" source="*mac_vendor.csv" ] | fillnull value="no vendor found" | table eth_src, vendor, ip_src_combined, src_query_name | dedup ip_src_combined | rename ip_src_combined as ip | join type=left ip [ | loadjob $subsearch_id_internal_endpoints$ | stats sum(frame_len) as out by ip_src_combined | rename ip_src_combined as ip ] | join type=left ip [ | loadjob $subsearch_id_internal_endpoints$ | stats sum(frame_len) as in by ip_dst_combined | rename ip_dst_combined as ip ] | join type=left ip [ | loadjob $subsearch_id_internal_endpoints$ | table traffic_analyzer_stream, ip_src_combined, ip_dst_combined, tcp_stream | where tcp_stream!="" | untable traffic_analyzer_stream, type, ip | dedup traffic_analyzer_stream, type | stats count(traffic_analyzer_stream) as "# of Connections" by ip | where ip!="" | table ip, "# of Connections" ] | eval "Traffic In" = in/1024, "Traffic Out" = out/1024 | table eth_src, vendor, ip, src_query_name, "Traffic In", "Traffic Out", "# of Connections" | rename eth_src as "MAC", vendor as "Vendor", ip as "IP", src_query_name as "DNS Name" | fillnull value=0
